/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++0x -Wall -pedantic -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/ext/glad/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/ext/tiny_obj_loader/tiny_obj_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/GLSL.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/MatrixStack.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/Program.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/Shape.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/Texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/WindowManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/shadowBase.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o shadowBase -lglfw -lGL -ldl
